Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored the Suns to win based on their recent performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The matchup has an over/under of 229.5.
The game starts at 5:00 PM ET on AZFamily and KJZZ.
The Suns have covered the spread 13 times this season (13-23-0).
The Jazz are 18-17-1 against the spread this year.
The Suns have gone over the total 17 times this season.
The Jazz have gone over the point total 52.8% of the time this year (19 of 36 games with a set point total).
When playing at home, Phoenix owns a worse record against the spread (6-13-0) compared to its ATS record in away games (7-10-0).
The Suns have eclipsed the over/under in seven of 19 home games (36.8%). They've fared better in away games, going over the total in 10 of 17 matchups (58.8%).
Utah's winning percentage against the spread at home is.375 (6-9-1). Away, it is.600 (12-8-0).
In 2024-25 a lower percentage of the Jazz's games have finished above the over/under at home (37.5%, six of 16) than on the road (65%, 13 of 20)
Others: The Suns are led by Devin Booker's numbers on the season, 24.4 points, 3.9 boards and 7 assists per contest, shooting 42.9% from the floor and 32.5% from downtown, with an average of 2.5 made 3-pointers.
Kevin Durant is averaging 27.2 points, 6.3 boards and 4 assists. At the other end, he averages 0.7 steals and 1.3 blocked shots.

Bradley Beal is averaging 18 points, 3.7 boards and 3.2 assists.

Collin Sexton provides the Jazz 18 points, 2.8 boards and 3.9 assists. He also averages 0.8 steals and 0.1 blocks.
